post: Hello O.K! Nice to see more people from East Europe. Oh, I wonder where does one include piece of Holy Cross (around 40.cm) kept in Serbian monastery on MT. Atos, with a crystal made capsul that holds the blood of Christ… It came there after the 1204. As a gift to prince – monk St. Sava, when his brother took the crown from Nicaea. Anyway, the best description comes from the Antonius of Novgorod….
title: The Letter from Alexius Comnenus
